bibl.title: Greek Elegiac Poetry from the Seventh to the Fifth Centuries B.C.
bibl.seg: GERBER Douglas E. (Edited and Translated by), Greek Elegiac Poetry from the Seventh to the Fifth Centuries B.C. (The Loeb Classical Library. 258.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1999, 8°, viii-493 pp. ISBN 0-674-99582-1. £12.95.

C.R. par H.G. Edinger, Phoenix 54 (2000) pp. 341-343 [concerne aussi: IDEM (Edited and Translated by), Greek Iambic Poetry from the Seventh to the Fifth Centuries B.C. (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 1999)]. - Pascale Hummel, RPhil 3e s., 73 (1999) pp. 295-296 [idem]. - Martin L. West, CR N.S., 50 (2000) pp. 402-403 [idem].
